roleset.name: Hurriedly glide or skip along

example.name: Animate skitterer example
example.text: Terrified, they skittered to higher ground.

example.name: Inanimate skitterer
example.text: The stone skittered across the pond.

example.name: Aminate skitterer with both manner and location
example.src: Aminate skitterer with both manner and location
example.type: Aminate skitterer with both manner and location
example.text: The crab skittered sideways across the beach.

example.name: Example without location
example.text: The scared child skittered off to find his mother

roleset.note: Created based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. VN class run-51.3.2. No FN entry. Framed by Katie

roleset.name: Twitch a fishing hook along a surface

roles.note: Appears to be limited to fishing.

example.name: Example with all arguements
example.text: He skittered the hook of his fishing line over the surface of the water.
example.arg: the hook of his fishing line
over the surface of the water.
